sqlMap.select: select GXZRQDM,GXPCSDM,GXFJDM, nvl(sum(case when xt_zxbz = '0' and xt_zhxgsj = xt_lrsj then 1 else 0 end), 0) xz, nvl(sum(case when xt_zxbz = '0' and xt_zhxgsj <> xt_lrsj then 1 else 0 end), 0) xg, nvl(sum(case when xt_zxbz = '1' then 1 else 0 end), 0) zx from syrk_syrkxxzb where xt_zhxgsj like '$date$%' and SYRKYWLXDM=#syrkywlxdm# group by GXZRQDM,GXPCSDM,GXFJDM

select b.GXZRQDM,b.GXPCSDM,b.GXFJDM, nvl(sum(case when a.xt_zxbz = '0' and a.xt_zhxgsj =a.xt_lrsj then 1 else 0 end), 0) xz, nvl(sum(case when a.xt_zxbz = '0' and a.xt_zhxgsj <> a.xt_lrsj then 1 else 0 end), 0) xg, nvl(sum(case when a.xt_zxbz = '1' then 1 else 0 end), 0) zx from syrk_czrkxxb a left join syrk_syrkxxzb b on a.id=b.id where a.xt_zhxgsj like '$date$%' and a.SFRHYZDM=#sfrhyzdm# group by b.GXZRQDM,b.GXPCSDM,b.GXFJDM

select GLBMID gxzrqdm ,GLPCSID gxpcsdm,GLFXJID gxfjdm, nvl(sum(case when xt_zxbz = '0' and xt_zhxgsj = xt_lrsj then 1 else 0 end), 0) xz, nvl(sum(case when xt_zxbz = '0' and xt_zhxgsj <> xt_lrsj then 1 else 0 end), 0) xg, nvl(sum(case when xt_zxbz = '1' then 1 else 0 end), 0) zx from DW_DWJBXXB where xt_zhxgsj like '$date$%' group by GLBMID,GLPCSID,GLFXJID

select b.GLBMID gxzrqdm ,b.GLPCSID gxpcsdm,b.GLFXJID gxfjdm, nvl(sum(case when a.xt_zxbz = '0' and a.xt_zhxgsj = a.xt_lrsj then 1 else 0 end), 0) xz, nvl(sum(case when a.xt_zxbz = '0' and a.xt_zhxgsj <> a.xt_lrsj then 1 else 0 end), 0) xg, nvl(sum(case when a.xt_zxbz = '1' then 1 else 0 end), 0) zx from DW_CYRYXXB a left join DW_DWJBXXB b on a.dwid=b.id where a.xt_zhxgsj like '$date$%' group by b.GLBMID,b.GLPCSID,b.GLFXJID
